from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (user_id, dept_id, login_name, username, user_type, email, phone, sex, img, password, salt, status, login_date, operator, operate_time, remark ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
